title: How to Wash a Synthetic Wig in 9 Easy Steps

steps.title: Browse your local beauty supply store for a good synthetic wig shampoo.
steps.content: Browse your local beauty supply store for a good synthetic wig shampoo. You want to look for a wig shampoo that doesn't have any alcohol in it. You also want to make sure it doesn't strip the color. Good wig shampoo should be around six dollars. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Comb out the wig using a wide tooth comb or a wig brush.
steps.content: Comb out the wig using a wide tooth comb or a wig brush. Start at the bottom and comb all the way through to the top. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Fill up a sink or basin with cold water.
steps.content: Fill up a sink or basin with cold water. Then add one to two capfuls of shampoo to the water, or however many capfuls it says on the bottle. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Place the wig in the water.
steps.content: Place the wig in the water. Make sure it is fully submerged. Do not scrub the wig, because it will tangle the hair. Instead handle it gently and wash out the cap of the wig as well. Wash it thoroughly for a minute or so.

steps.title: Let it soak for five minutes.
steps.content: Let it soak for five minutes.

steps.title: Take the wig out of the water and drain the water out.
steps.content: Take the wig out of the water and drain the water out. Then rinse the wig with cold water only.

steps.title: Shake the wig by the nape or the back of the wig.
steps.content: Shake the wig by the nape or the back of the wig. Then take some synthetic wig conditioner spray and spray it. Now, after spraying it, shake it out again. steps.title: Put the wig on a mannequin head or wig stand.
steps.content: Put the wig on a mannequin head or wig stand. If you donâ€™t dry the wig on a mannequin head or wig stand designed specifically for the job, the wig may dry in an incorrect shape and shrink or stretch. The mannequin head or wig stand also allows you to pre-style the wig before wearing it, which is super helpful.

steps.title: Comb out the wig when it is completely dry and store it.
steps.content: Comb out the wig when it is completely dry and store it . Never use heat to style a regular synthetic wig. [5] X Trustworthy Source American Cancer Society Nonprofit devoted to promoting cancer research, education, and support Go to source
